name: unabsorbent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to take liquid in through the surface and hold it: The soil was very dry but unabsorbent. The map was printed on smooth, unabsorbent paper. Related word
absorbent
More examplesFewer examplesThe towels in the hotel bathroom were rather thin and unabsorbent. The metal surface is hard and unabsorbent.Unabsorbent fabrics do not tend to stain as badly.The paint is designed to be used on hard, unabsorbent materials.Floods can occur in places where there is little vegetation and the soil is relatively unabsorbent.
